### Full List (from BibTeX)

```{python}
import bibtexparser, textwrap, json, pathlib
bib_path = pathlib.Path('publications.bib')
if bib_path.exists():
    with open(bib_path) as f:
        db = bibtexparser.load(f)
    for entry in db.entries:
        authors = entry.get('author','').replace('\n',' ')
        title = entry.get('title','').rstrip('.')
        year = entry.get('year','')
        journal = entry.get('journal', entry.get('booktitle',''))
        doi = entry.get('doi','')
        line = f"{authors} ({year}). {title}. *{journal}*."
        if doi:
            line += f" doi:{doi}"
        print(line)
else:
    print('Add a publications.bib file to enable auto-listing.')
```
